      @NonNull @Deprecated public MobileWalletAdapterClient.SignPayloadsFuture signMessages(@NonNull @Size(min=1L) byte[][] messages, @NonNull @Size(min=1L) byte[][] addresses) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Consumers of signMessages(byte[][], byte[][]) should migrate to signMessagesDetached(byte[][], byte[][]), which offers an improved return type, separating the message from the signatures
